titles.this-link-will-display-chat-messages-as-: This link will display chat messages as a streaming list. Use as an overlay or as a control dock.
titles.jump-to-dockable-streaming-chat-link-opt: Jump to dockable streaming chat link options.
titles.note-you-must-first-interact-with-the-do: Note: You must first interact with the dock-page for any audio to be audible.
titles.tip-you-can-use-mynamename1name2-to-list: Tip: You can use &myname=name1,name2 to list names to exclude from TTS.
titles.html-is-removed-from-messages-donations-: HTML is removed from messages, donations, and names for this dock only.
titles.larger-twitch-post-images-instagram-imag: larger twitch post images, instagram images, giphy images (not emojis)
titles.notehostbot-names-to-help-identify-themt:
Note:
Host/bot name(s) to help identify them.
The list of names should be comma separated.
The first name listed may be used as the host's name in stream when their name is not otherwise known.
titles.this-link-will-only-show-selected-messag: This link will only show selected messages, one at a time. Requires the dock to select messages.
titles.jump-to-single-message-overlay-link-opti: Jump to single message overlay link options.
titles.this-link-will-only-show-the-inbound-emo: This link will only show the inbound emotes, bouncing them around the full page.
titles.jump-to-the-emote-wall-link-options: Jump to the emote wall link options.
titles.this-link-shows-a-score-for-recent-chat-: This link shows a score for recent chat activity per chat source
titles.jump-to-the-hype-meter-link-options: Jump to the hype meter link options.
titles.this-link-shows-a-list-of-names-represen: This link shows a list of names representing users in a waiting list
titles.jump-to-the-waitlist-link-options: Jump to the waitlist link options.
titles.jump-to-the-global-settings-and-tools: Jump to the global settings and tools.
titles.capture-likes-subs-and-other-available-e: Capture likes, subs, and other available event data.
titles.provide-comma-separated-values-values-th: Provide comma separated values; values that match a word in the event will be rejected. eg: joined,banned,gifted
titles.see-documentation-on-socialstreamninja-f: See documentation on socialstream.ninja for details.
titles.some-sites-may-wish-to-access-your-strea: Some sites may wish to access your stream ID for custom third party integrations
titles.mainly-useful-if-p2p-not-working: Mainly useful if P2P not working
titles.interval-offset-in-minutes-0-to-issue-ju: Interval offset in minutes; 0 to issue just once.
titles.just-text-is-captured-no-html-so-no-bttv: Just text is captured. No HTML, so no BTTV emotes, etc.
titles.censor-common-bad-words-with-asterixis-c: Censor common bad words with asterixis. Create badwords.txt to make your own blacklist.
titles.filter-out-messages-that-might-be-chat-c: Filter out messages that might be chat commands.
titles.provide-comma-separated-values-values-th: Provide comma separated values; values that match a username will be rejected.
titles.if-a-name-lacks-color-data-randomly-add-: If a name lacks color data, randomly add one.
titles.members-on-youtube-wont-have-green-names: Members on Youtube won't have green names, for example.
titles.copy-youtube-video-id-to-the-clipboard: Copy YouTube video ID to the clipboard.

innerHTML.make-the-font-icons-and-menu-smaller: 🔎➖ Make the font, icons, and menu smaller

innerHTML.messages-appear-randomly-on-the-screen: 🔀 Messages appear randomly on the screen

innerHTML.when-enabled-a-tally-score-of-unique-nam: When enabled, a tally score of unique names per chat source is tracked. Stop/start to reset the tally.

innerHTML.light-mode--black-text-white-outline: ⚪ Light mode — Black text, white outline

innerHTML.1-to-open-your-chat-pop-ups-on-start-you: 1. To open your chat pop-up(s) on start your OBS program, if you open/refresh the streaming chat as an OBS dock.
